```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(cwbhq)
n_team <- 10
n_ite <- 20
att_list1 <- main(n_team,n_ite)
cwb <- NULL
for(i in 1:n_ite+1){
  cwb[i] <- sum(att_list1$cwb[i,] > 0.5)
}
plot(cwb)
```
